00001 /*
00002 ###############################################################################
00003 #
00004 #  EGSnrc egs++ voxelized human phantom geometry headers
00005 #  Copyright (C) 2015 National Research Council Canada
00006 #
00007 #  This file is part of EGSnrc.
00008 #
00009 #  EGSnrc is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under
00010 #  the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as published by the
00011 #  Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your
00012 #  option) any later version.
00013 #
00014 #  EGSnrc is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY
00015 #  WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS
00016 #  FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU Affero General Public License for
00017 #  more details.
00018 #
00019 #  You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
00020 #  along with EGSnrc. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
00021 #
00022 ###############################################################################
00023 #
00024 #  Author:          Iwan Kawrakow, 2008
00025 #
00026 #  Contributors:    Frederic Tessier
00027 #
00028 ###############################################################################
00029 #
00030 #  A "Voxelized Human Phantom" (VHP) geometry.
00031 #
00032 #  Although a VHP geometry is just a XYZ geometry, due to the huge number of
00033 #  voxels one has to be more careful with memory use for media indices, etc.
00034 #  That's why this separate geometry implementation. With Richard Kramer's
00035 #  phantom data the implementation requires ~12 MB to hold all the organ data
00036 #  in memory. Richard's ASCII phantom data was also transformed into binary
00037 #  format with the result that loading them is almost instantaneous.
00038 #
00039 #  For now the implementation only provides the macro geometry, i.e., no
00040 #  spongiosa micro matrices. Adding the micro matrices is the next step.
00041 #
00042 ###############################################################################
00043 */
00044

00090 struct EGS_VHP_LOCAL VHP_RowInfo {
00091     unsigned short  nbin;
00092     unsigned short *pix;
00093     unsigned char  *org;
00094     VHP_RowInfo() : nbin(0) {};
00095     ~VHP_RowInfo() { if( nbin > 0 ) { delete [] pix; delete [] org; } };
00096     int getBin(int i) const {
00097         int ml=0, mu=nbin;
00098         while( mu - ml > 1 ) {
00099             int mav = (ml+mu)/2;
00100             if( i < pix[mav] ) mu = mav; else ml = mav;
00101         }
00102         return mu-1;
00103     };
00104     int getOrgan(int pixel) const {
00105         return pixel < pix[0] || pixel >= pix[nbin] ? 0 : org[getBin(pixel)];
00106     };
00107     int getSize() const {
00108         int result = sizeof(nbin) + sizeof(unsigned short *) +
00109                      sizeof(unsigned char *);
00110         if( nbin > 0 ) result += nbin*sizeof(unsigned char) +
00111             (nbin+1)*sizeof(unsigned short);
00112         return result;
00113     };
00114     void readData(istream &in);
00115 };
00116 #endif
00117 
00118 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00119 
00123 struct EGS_VHP_LOCAL VHP_SliceInfo {
00124     unsigned short  firstr;
00125     unsigned short  lastr;
00126     VHP_RowInfo    *rinfo;
00127     VHP_SliceInfo() : rinfo(0) {};
00128     ~VHP_SliceInfo() { if( rinfo ) delete [] rinfo; };
00129     void getSliceDimensions(int &nx, int &ny) {
00130         ny = lastr+1; nx = 0;
00131         int nrow = lastr - firstr + 1;
00132         for(int j=0; j<nrow; ++j) {
00133             int ni = rinfo[j].pix[rinfo[j].nbin];
00134             if( ni > nx ) nx = ni;
00135         }
00136     };
00137     int getOrgan(int row, int pixel) const {
00138         return rinfo && row >= firstr && row <= lastr ?
00139             rinfo[row-firstr].getOrgan(pixel) : 0;
00140     };
00141     int getSize() const {
00142         int result = sizeof(firstr) + sizeof(lastr) +
00143             sizeof(VHP_RowInfo*);
00144         if( rinfo ) {
00145             int nrow = lastr-firstr+1;
00146             for(int j=0; j<nrow; ++j) result += rinfo[j].getSize();
00147         }
00148         return result;
00149     };
00150     void readData(istream &in);
00151 };
00152 #endif

00159 class EGS_VHP_LOCAL VHP_OrganData {
00160 public:
00161     VHP_OrganData(const char *fname, int slice_min=0, int slice_max=1000000);
00162     ~VHP_OrganData();
00163 
00164     int         nSlice() const { return nslice; };
00165     int         getOrgan(int islice, int i, int j) const {
00166         return islice >= 0 && islice < nslice ?
00167             slices[islice].getOrgan(i,j) : 0;
00168     };
00169     const VHP_SliceInfo &getVHP_SliceInfo(int j) const { return slices[j]; };
00170     const VHP_SliceInfo &operator[](int j) const { return slices[j]; };
00171     int getSize() const {
00172         int result = sizeof(nslice) + sizeof(VHP_SliceInfo*);
00173         if( nslice > 0 ) {
00174             for(int j=0; j<nslice; ++j) result += slices[j].getSize();
00175         }
00176         return result;
00177     };
00178     void getPhantomDimensions(int &Nx, int &Ny, int &Nz) {
00179         Nx = nx; Ny = ny; Nz = nslice;
00180     };
00181     void getVoxelSizes(EGS_Float &Dx, EGS_Float &Dy, EGS_Float &Dz) {
00182         Dx = dx; Dy = dy; Dz = dz;
00183     };
00184     int getOrgan(int ireg) const {
00185         int k = ireg/nxy;
00186         if( k < 0 || k >= nslice ) return 0;
00187         int jj = ireg - k*nx*ny;
00188         int j = jj/nx; int i = jj - j*nx;
00189         return getOrgan(k,j,i);
00190     };
00191 
00192     bool isOK() const { return ok; };
00193 
00194 protected:
00195     double          dx, dy, dz;
00196     VHP_SliceInfo  *slices;
00197     unsigned short  nslice;
00198     int             nx, ny, nxy;
00199     bool            ok;
00200 };
00201 #endif

00218 class EGS_VHP_LOCAL EGS_VoxelGeometry {
00219 
00220 public:
00221 
00222       EGS_Float        dx, dxi, xmin, xmax;
00223       EGS_Float        dy, dyi, ymin, ymax;
00224       EGS_Float        dz, dzi, zmin, zmax;
00225       int              nx, ny, nz, nxy;
00226       int              ix, iy, iz;
00227 
00228       static EGS_VoxelInfo *v;
00229       static int           nv;
00230 
00231       EGS_VoxelGeometry(int Nx, int Ny, int Nz,
00232               EGS_Float Dx, EGS_Float Dy, EGS_Float Dz) :
00233               dx(Dx), dxi(1/Dx), xmin(0), xmax(Dx*Nx),
00234               dy(Dy), dyi(1/Dy), ymin(0), ymax(Dy*Ny),
00235               dz(Dz), dzi(1/Dz), zmin(0), zmax(Dz*Nz),
00236               nx(Nx), ny(Ny), nz(Nz), nxy(nx*ny) {};
00237 
00238       ~EGS_VoxelGeometry() { if(v) { delete [] v; v = 0; nv = 0; } };
00239 
00240       bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00241           return (x.x >= xmin && x.x <= xmax &&
00242                   x.y >= ymin && x.y <= ymax &&
00243                   x.z >= zmin && x.z <= zmax ) ? true : false;
00244       };
00245 
00246       void setIndeces(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00247           ix = (int) (x.x*dxi); if( ix >= nx ) ix = nx-1;
00248           iy = (int) (x.y*dyi); if( iy >= ny ) iy = ny-1;
00249           iz = (int) (x.z*dzi); if( iz >= nz ) iz = nz-1;
00250       };
00251 
00252       int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00253           if( !isInside(x) ) return -1;
00254           setIndeces(x);
00255           return ix + iy*nx + iz*nxy;
00256       };
00257 
00258       int isWhereFast(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00259           setIndeces(x);
00260           return ix + iy*nx + iz*nxy;
00261       };
00262 
00263       int computeIntersections(int ireg, int n, const EGS_Vector &X,
00264               const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_GeometryIntersections *isections) {
00265           if( n < 1 ) return -1;
00266           if( nv < n ) {
00267               if( nv > 0 ) delete [] v;
00268               v = new EGS_VoxelInfo [n]; nv = n;
00269           }
00270           int ifirst = 0; EGS_Float t, ttot = 0; EGS_Vector x(X); int imed;
00271           if( ireg < 0 ) {
00272               t = 1e30; ireg = howfar(ireg,x,u,t);
00273               if( ireg < 0 ) return 0;
00274               isections[0].t = t; isections[0].rhof = 1;
00275               isections[0].ireg = -1; isections[0].imed = -1;
00276               ttot = t; ++ifirst; x += u*t;
00277           }
00278           int iz = ireg/nxy; int ir = ireg - iz*nxy;
00279           int iy = ir/nx; int ix = ir - iy*nx;
00280           EGS_Float uxi, uyi, uzi, nextx, nexty, nextz, sx, sy, sz;
00281           int dirx, icx, diry, icy, dirz, icz;
00282           if( u.x > 0 )      {
00283               uxi = 1/u.x; dirx =  1; nextx = (dx*(ix+1)-x.x)*uxi; sx = uxi*dx;
00284           }
00285           else if( u.x < 0 ) {
00286               uxi = 1/u.x; dirx = -1; nextx = (dx*ix-x.x)*uxi; sx = -uxi*dx;
00287           }
00288           else { dirx =  1; nextx = 1e33; sx = 1e33; }
00289           if( u.y > 0 )      {
00290               uyi = 1/u.y; diry =  1; nexty = (dy*(iy+1)-x.y)*uyi; sy = uyi*dy;
00291           }
00292           else if( u.y < 0 ) {
00293               uyi = 1/u.y; diry = -1; nexty = (dy*iy-x.y)*uyi; sy = -uyi*dy;
00294           }
00295           else { diry =  1; nexty = 1e33; sy = 1e33; }
00296           if( u.z > 0 )      {
00297               uzi = 1/u.z; dirz =  1; nextz = (dz*(iz+1)-x.z)*uzi; sz = uzi*dz;
00298           }
00299           else if( u.z < 0 ) {
00300               uzi = 1/u.z; dirz = -1; nextz = (dz*iz-x.z)*uzi; sz = -uzi*dz;
00301           }
00302           else  { dirz =  1; nextz = 1e33; sz = 1e33; }
00303           for(int j=ifirst; j<n; j++) {
00304               isections[j].ireg = ireg;
00305               v[j].ix = ix; v[j].iy = iy; v[j].iz = iz;
00306               int inew;
00307               if( nextx < nexty && nextx < nextz ) {
00308                   t = nextx; ix += dirx;
00309                   if( ix < 0 || ix >= nx ) inew = -1;
00310                   else {
00311                       inew = ireg + dirx; nextx += sx;
00312                   }
00313               }
00314               else if( nexty < nextz ) {
00315                   t = nexty; iy += diry;
00316                   if( iy < 0 || iy >= ny ) inew = -1;
00317                   else {
00318                       inew = ireg + nx*diry; nexty += sy;
00319                   }
00320               }
00321               else {
00322                   t = nextz; iz += dirz;
00323                   if( iz < 0 || iz >= nz ) inew = -1;
00324                   else {
00325                       inew = ireg + nxy*dirz; nextz += sz;
00326                   }
00327               }
00328               isections[j].t = t;
00329               if( inew < 0 ) return j+1;
00330           }
00331           return ireg >= 0 ? -1 : n;
00332       };
00333 
00334       EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00335                       const EGS_Vector &u) {
00336           if( ireg < 0 ) return 0;
00337           EGS_Float tx = u.x > 0 ? (xmax-x.x)/u.x :
00338                          u.x < 0 ? (xmin-x.x)/u.x : 1e35;
00339           EGS_Float ty = u.y > 0 ? (ymax-x.y)/u.y :
00340                          u.y < 0 ? (ymin-x.y)/u.y : 1e35;
00341           EGS_Float tz = u.z > 0 ? (zmax-x.z)/u.z :
00342                          u.z < 0 ? (zmin-x.z)/u.z : 1e35;
00343           return tx < ty && tx < tz ? tx : ty < tz ? ty : tz;
00344       };
00345 
00346       void setIndeces(int ireg) {
00347           iz = ireg/nxy; int ir = ireg - iz*nxy;
00348           iy = ir/nx; ix = ir - iy*nx;
00349       };
00350 
00351       //int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00352       //        EGS_Float &t, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00353       //    setIndeces(ireg);
00354       //    return howfar(ireg,ix,iy,iz,x,u,t,normal);
00355       //};
00356       int howfarIn(int ireg, int Ix, int Iy, int Iz, const EGS_Vector &x,
00357               const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &t, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00358           ix = Ix; iy = Iy; iz = Iz;
00359           return howfarIn(ireg,x,u,t,normal);
00360       };
00361 
00362       int howfarIn(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00363               EGS_Float &t, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00364           int ixs = ix, iys = iy, izs = iz;
00365           int inew = ireg;
00366           if( u.x > 0 ) {
00367               EGS_Float d = (dx*(ix+1)-x.x)/u.x;
00368               if( d <= t ) {
00369                   t = d; if( (++ix) < nx ) inew = ireg + 1; else inew = -1;
00370                   if( normal ) *normal = EGS_Vector(-1,0,0);
00371               }
00372           }
00373           else if( u.x < 0 ) {
00374               EGS_Float d = (dx*ix-x.x)/u.x;
00375               if( d <= t ) {
00376                   t = d; if( (--ix) >= 0 ) inew = ireg - 1; else inew = -1;
00377                   if( normal ) *normal = EGS_Vector(1,0,0);
00378               }
00379           }
00380           if( u.y > 0 ) {
00381               EGS_Float d = (dy*(iy+1)-x.y)/u.y;
00382               if( d <= t ) {
00383                   ix = ixs;
00384                   t = d; if( (++iy) < ny ) inew = ireg + nx; else inew = -1;
00385                   if( normal ) *normal = EGS_Vector(0,-1,0);
00386               }
00387           }
00388           else if( u.y < 0 ) {
00389               EGS_Float d = (dy*iy-x.y)/u.y;
00390               if( d <= t ) {
00391                   ix = ixs;
00392                   t = d; if( (--iy) >= 0 ) inew = ireg - nx; else inew = -1;
00393                   if( normal ) *normal = EGS_Vector(0,1,0);
00394               }
00395           }
00396           if( u.z > 0 ) {
00397               EGS_Float d = (dz*(iz+1)-x.z)/u.z;
00398               if( d <= t ) {
00399                   ix = ixs; iy = iys;
00400                   t = d; if( (++iz) < nz ) inew = ireg+nxy; else inew = -1;
00401                   if( normal ) *normal = EGS_Vector(0,0,-1);
00402               }
00403           }
00404           else if( u.z < 0 ) {
00405               EGS_Float d = (dz*iz-x.z)/u.z;
00406               if( d <= t ) {
00407                   ix = ixs; iy = iys;
00408                   t = d; if( (--iz) >= 0 ) inew = ireg-nxy; else inew = -1;
00409                   if( normal ) *normal = EGS_Vector(0,0,1);
00410               }
00411           }
00412           return inew;
00413       };
00414 
00415       int howfarOut(const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00416               EGS_Float &t, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00417           EGS_Float tlong = 2*t, d; int inew = -1;
00418           if( x.x <= xmin && u.x > 0 ) {
00419               ix = 0; d = (xmin-x.x)/u.x;
00420           }
00421           else if( x.x >= xmax && u.x < 0 ) {
00422               ix = nx-1; d = (xmax-x.x)/u.x;
00423           }
00424           else d = tlong;
00425           if( d <= t ) {
00426               EGS_Float yy = x.y + u.y*d, zz = x.z + u.z*d;
00427               if( yy >= ymin && yy <= ymax && zz >= zmin && zz <= zmax ) {
00428                   t = d;
00429                   iy = (int) (yy*dyi); if( iy > ny-1 ) iy = ny-1;
00430                   iz = (int) (zz*dzi); if( iz > nz-1 ) iz = nz-1;
00431                   if( normal ) *normal = ix == 0 ? EGS_Vector(-1,0,0) :
00432                                                    EGS_Vector(1,0,0);
00433                   return ix + iy*nx + iz*nxy;
00434               }
00435           }
00436           if( x.y <= ymin && u.y > 0 ) {
00437               iy = 0; d = (ymin-x.y)/u.y;
00438           }
00439           else if( x.y >= ymax && u.y < 0 ) {
00440               iy = ny-1; d = (ymax-x.y)/u.y;
00441           }
00442           else d = tlong;
00443           if( d <= t ) {
00444               EGS_Float xx = x.x + u.x*d, zz = x.z + u.z*d;
00445               if( xx >= xmin && xx <= xmax && zz >= zmin && zz <= zmax ) {
00446                   t = d;
00447                   ix = (int) (xx*dxi); if( ix > nx-1 ) ix = nx-1;
00448                   iz = (int) (zz*dzi); if( iz > nz-1 ) iz = nz-1;
00449                   if( normal ) *normal = iy == 0 ? EGS_Vector(0,-1,0) :
00450                                                    EGS_Vector(0,1,0);
00451                   return ix + iy*nx + iz*nxy;
00452               }
00453           }
00454           if( x.z <= zmin && u.z > 0 ) {
00455               iz = 0; d = (zmin-x.z)/u.z;
00456           }
00457           else if( x.z >= zmax && u.z < 0 ) {
00458               iz = nz-1; d = (zmax-x.z)/u.z;
00459           }
00460           else d = tlong;
00461           if( d <= t ) {
00462               EGS_Float xx = x.x + u.x*d, yy = x.y + u.y*d;
00463               if( xx >= xmin && xx <= xmax && yy >= ymin && yy <= ymax ) {
00464                   t = d;
00465                   ix = (int) (xx*dxi); if( ix > nx-1 ) ix = nx-1;
00466                   iy = (int) (yy*dyi); if( iy > ny-1 ) iy = ny-1;
00467                   if( normal ) *normal = iz == 0 ? EGS_Vector(0,0,-1) :
00468                                                    EGS_Vector(0,0,1);
00469                   return ix + iy*nx + iz*nxy;
00470               }
00471           }
00472           return -1;
00473       };
00474 
00475       int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00476                  EGS_Float &t, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00477           if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00478               setIndeces(ireg);
00479               return howfarIn(ireg,x,u,t,normal);
00480           }
00481           return howfarOut(x,u,t,normal);
00482       };
00483 
00484       EGS_Float hownearIn(int Ix, int Iy, int Iz, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00485           ix = Ix; iy = Iy; iz = Iz;
00486           return hownearIn(x);
00487       };
00488 
00489       EGS_Float hownearIn(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00490           EGS_Float t1,t2,tx,ty,tz;
00491           t1 = x.x-dx*ix; t2 = dx - t1; tx = t1 < t2 ? t1 : t2;
00492           t1 = x.y-dy*iy; t2 = dy - t1; ty = t1 < t2 ? t1 : t2;
00493           t1 = x.z-dz*iz; t2 = dz - t1; tz = t1 < t2 ? t1 : t2;
00494           return tx < ty && tx < tz ? tx : ty < tz ? ty : tz;
00495       };
00496 
00497       EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00498           if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00499               setIndeces(ireg); return hownearIn(x);
00500           }
00501           int nc = 0; EGS_Float s1=0, s2=0;
00502           if( x.x < xmin || x.x > xmax ) {
00503               EGS_Float t = x.x < xmin ? xmin-x.x : x.x-xmax;
00504               nc++; s1 += t; s2 += t*t;
00505           }
00506           if( x.y < ymin || x.y > ymax ) {
00507               EGS_Float t = x.y < ymin ? ymin-x.y : x.y-ymax;
00508               nc++; s1 += t; s2 += t*t;
00509           }
00510           if( x.z < zmin || x.z > zmax ) {
00511               EGS_Float t = x.z < zmin ? zmin-x.z : x.z-zmax;
00512               nc++; s1 += t; s2 += t*t;
00513           }
00514           return nc == 1 ? s1 : sqrt(s2);
00515       };
00516 };
00517 #endif

00519 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00520 
00524 struct VHPBox {
00525     EGS_Float xmin, xmax;
00526     EGS_Float ymin, ymax;
00527     EGS_Float zmin, zmax;
00528     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) { return
00529         (x.x>=xmin&&x.x<=xmax&&x.y>=ymin&&ymax<=ymin&&x.z>=zmin&&x.z<=zmax);
00530     };
00531     bool willEnter(const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &t) {
00532         EGS_Float tlong = 2*t, d;
00533         if( x.x <= xmin && u.x > 0 ) d = (xmin-x.x)/u.x;
00534         else if( x.x >= xmax && u.x < 0 ) d = (xmax-x.x)/u.x;
00535         else d = tlong;
00536         if( d <= t ) {
00537             EGS_Float yy = x.y + u.y*d, zz = x.z + u.z*d;
00538             if( yy >= ymin && yy <= ymax && zz >= zmin && zz <= zmax ) {
00539                 t = d; return true;
00540             }
00541         }
00542         if( x.y <= ymin && u.y > 0 ) d = (ymin-x.y)/u.y;
00543         else if( x.y >= ymax && u.y < 0 ) d = (ymax-x.y)/u.y;
00544         else d = tlong;
00545         if( d <= t ) {
00546             EGS_Float xx = x.x + u.x*d, zz = x.z + u.z*d;
00547             if( xx >= xmin && xx <= xmax && zz >= zmin && zz <= zmax ) {
00548                 t = d; return true;
00549             }
00550         }
00551         if( x.z <= zmin && u.z > 0 ) d = (zmin-x.z)/u.z;
00552         else if( x.z >= zmax && u.z < 0 ) d = (zmax-x.z)/u.z;
00553         else d = tlong;
00554         if( d <= t ) {
00555             EGS_Float xx = x.x + u.x*d, yy = x.y + u.y*d;
00556             if( xx >= xmin && xx <= xmax && yy >= ymin && yy <= ymax ) {
00557                 t = d; return true;
00558             }
00559         }
00560         return false;
00561     };
00562     EGS_Float howfarToOut(const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u) {
00563         EGS_Float t = 1e35, t1;
00564         if     ( u.x > 0 ) { t1 = (xmax-x.x)/u.x; if( t1 < t ) t = t1; }
00565         else if( u.x < 0 ) { t1 = (xmin-x.x)/u.x; if( t1 < t ) t = t1; }
00566         if     ( u.y > 0 ) { t1 = (ymax-x.y)/u.y; if( t1 < t ) t = t1; }
00567         else if( u.y < 0 ) { t1 = (ymin-x.y)/u.y; if( t1 < t ) t = t1; }
00568         if     ( u.z > 0 ) { t1 = (zmax-x.z)/u.z; if( t1 < t ) t = t1; }
00569         else if( u.z < 0 ) { t1 = (zmin-x.z)/u.z; if( t1 < t ) t = t1; }
00570         return t;
00571     };
00572 };
00573 #endif
00574 
00575 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00576 
00580 class EGS_VHP_LOCAL EGS_MicroMatrixCluster {
00581 
00582 public:
00583 
00584     EGS_MicroMatrixCluster(EGS_Float Dx, EGS_Float Dy, EGS_Float Dz,
00585                            EGS_Float bsc_thickness, int tb_med, int bm_med,
00586                            const char *micro_file);
00587 
00588     ~EGS_MicroMatrixCluster();
00589 
00590 
00591     int howfar(int imic, int ireg, int &lax, int &lay, int &laz, int &newmic,
00592             const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00593             EGS_Float &t, int *newmed=0, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00594         int inew = vg->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,normal);
00595         newmic = imic;
00596         if( inew < 0 ) {
00597             int iz = imic/(mx*my); int itmp = imic - iz*mx*my;
00598             int iy = itmp/mx; int ix = itmp - mx*iy;
00599             if     ( vg->ix < 0 )       { --lax; if( (--ix) < 0   ) ix = mx-1; }
00600             else if( vg->ix >= vg->nx ) { ++lax; if( (++ix) >= mx ) ix = 0;    }
00601             else if( vg->iy < 0 )       { --lay; if( (--iy) < 0   ) iy = my-1; }
00602             else if( vg->iy >= vg->ny ) { ++lay; if( (++iy) >= my ) iy = 0;    }
00603             else if( vg->iz < 0 )       { --laz; if( (--iz) < 0   ) iz = mz-1; }
00604             else if( vg->iz >= vg->nz ) { ++laz; if( (++iz) >= mz ) iz = 0;    }
00605             newmic = ix + iy*mx + iz*mx*my;
00606         }
00607         if( newmed ) *newmed = micros[newmic][inew] ? med_bm : med_tb;
00608         return inew;
00609     };
00610 
00611     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00612         return vg->hownear(ireg,x);
00613     };
00614 
00615     int medium(int imic, int ireg) const {
00616         return micros[imic][ireg] ? med_bm : med_tb;
00617     };
00618 
00619     int medium(int ireg) const {
00620         int imic = ireg/nreg; ireg -= imic*nreg;
00621         return medium(imic,ireg);
00622     };
00623 
00624     int isWhere(int &imic, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00625         int ix = (int) (x.x*dxi), iy = (int) (x.y*dyi), iz = (int) (x.z*dzi);
00626         EGS_Vector x1(x - EGS_Vector(dx*ix, dy*iy, dz*iz));
00627         ix = ix%mx; iy = iy%my; iz = iz%mz;
00628         imic = ix + iy*mx + iz*mz;
00629         return vg->isWhere(x1);
00630     };
00631 
00632     void getIndeces(int ireg, int &imic, int &ix, int &iy, int &iz) {
00633         imic = ireg/nreg; ireg -= imic*nreg;
00634         iz = ireg/nxy; iy = (ireg - iz*nxy)/nx; ix = ireg - iz*nxy - iy*nx;
00635     };
00636 
00637     int isWhere(int jx, int jy, int jz, const EGS_Vector &x1, int *newmed=0) {
00638         int ix = jx%mx, iy = jy%my, iz = jz%mz;
00639         int imic = ix + iy*mx + iz*mz;
00640         int iloc = vg->isWhereFast(x1);
00641         if( newmed ) *newmed = medium(imic,iloc);
00642         return imic*nreg + iloc;
00643     };
00644 
00645     bool isValid() const { return (vg && micros); };
00646 
00647     void getStepFractions(int imic, int ireg,
00648             const EGS_Vector &xi, const EGS_Vector &xf,
00649             EGS_Float &bsc_step, EGS_Float &bm_step ) {
00650         bsc_step = 0; bm_step = 0; int mict = micros[imic][ireg];
00651         if( mict ) {
00652             // a BM voxel => check step fractions
00653             if( mict == 1 ) bsc_step = 1;      // all BSC
00654             else if( mict == 2 ) bm_step = 1;  // all BM
00655             else {
00656                 mict -= 2;
00657                 // get positions in bm_boxes co-ordinate system
00658                 int jz = ireg/nxy; int jy = (ireg-jz*nxy)/nx;
00659                 int jx = ireg-jz*nxy-jy*nx;
00660                 EGS_Vector xcorner(vg->dx*jx,vg->dy*jy,vg->dz*jz);
00661                 EGS_Vector Xi(xi-xcorner), Xf(xf-xcorner);
00662                 bool i_inside = bm_boxes[mict].isInside(Xi),
00663                      f_inside = bm_boxes[mict].isInside(Xf);
00664                 // if both positions are inside the BM box, the entire step
00665                 // is in the BM box
00666                 if( i_inside && f_inside ) bm_step = 1;
00667                 else {
00668                     // we have a fraction in BM and remainder in BSC
00669                     EGS_Vector u(Xf-Xi);
00670                     EGS_Float t = u.length(); EGS_Float ti = 1/t; u *= ti;
00671                     if( !i_inside ) {
00672                         // initial position outside of BM box => find entry
00673                         EGS_Float tt = t;
00674                         if( !bm_boxes[mict].willEnter(Xi,u,tt) ) {
00675                             // line Xi->Xf does not intersect BM box
00676                             bsc_step = 1; return;
00677                         }
00678                         // move to entry point
00679                         bsc_step = tt; Xi += u*tt;
00680                     }
00681                     if( f_inside ) {
00682                         // final position inside BM box. This implies initial
00683                         // position was outside. Because we already computed
00684                         // distance to BM box entry, the remainder goes to BM
00685                         bsc_step *= ti; bm_step = 1 - bsc_step; return;
00686                     }
00687                     // final position outside. this means that either the
00688                     // initial position was inside or that we moved to the
00689                     // entry point => BM fraction is distance to outside
00690                     bm_step = ti*bm_boxes[mict].howfarToOut(Xi,u);
00691                     bsc_step = 1 - bm_step;
00692                 }
00693             }
00694         }
00695     };
00696 
00697     void getVolumes(int imic, EGS_Float &tb, EGS_Float &bm, EGS_Float &bsc) {
00698         tb = v_tb[imic]; bm = v_bm[imic]; bsc = v_bsc[imic];
00699     };
00700 
00701 
00702     // ********************************************************************
00703 
00704     int       nx, ny, nz, nxy, nreg;
00705     int       mx, my, mz;   
00706     int       mxy, nmic;    
00707     EGS_Float dx, dy, dz;   
00708     EGS_Float dxi, dyi, dzi;
00709     EGS_Float t_bsc;        
00710 
00711     int       med_tb;       
00712     int       med_bm;       
00713 
00721     unsigned char     **micros;
00722     EGS_VoxelGeometry  *vg;   
00723     EGS_Float          *v_tb; 
00724     EGS_Float          *v_bm; 
00725     EGS_Float          *v_bsc;
00726 
00727     static VHPBox bm_boxes[64];
00728     static bool   bm_boxes_initialized;
00729 
00730 };
00731 #endif
00732 
00733 class EGS_VHP_EXPORT EGS_TestMicro : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00734 
00735 public:
00736 
00737     EGS_TestMicro(EGS_Float Dx, EGS_Float Dy, EGS_Float Dz, EGS_Float bsc_t,
00738           int tb_med, int bm_med,const char *micro_file, const string &Name="");
00739 
00740     ~EGS_TestMicro();
00741 
00742     int  inside(const EGS_Vector &x)   { return isWhere(x); };
00743     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) { return vg->isInside(x); }
00744     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00745         int ireg = vg->isWhere(x); if( ireg < 0 ) return ireg;
00746         EGS_Vector x1(x-EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz));
00747         int ix = vg->ix%micro->mx,
00748             iy = vg->iy%micro->my,
00749             iz = vg->iz%micro->mz;
00750         int imic = ix + iy*micro->mx + iz*micro->mxy;
00751         int iloc = micro->vg->isWhere(x1);
00752         return imic*nr + iloc;
00753     };
00754 
00755     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00756                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed=0, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00757         if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00758             int voxel = ireg/nr; int ilocal = ireg - voxel*nr;
00759             vg->setIndeces(voxel);
00760             EGS_Vector x1(x-EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz));
00761             int inew = micro->vg->howfar(ilocal,x1,u,t,normal);
00762             if( inew == ilocal ) return ireg;
00763             if( inew < 0 ) {
00764                 if( micro->vg->ix < 0 ) {
00765                     if( (--vg->ix) < 0 ) return -1;
00766                     micro->vg->ix = micro->vg->nx-1;
00767                 }
00768                 else if( micro->vg->ix >= micro->vg->nx ) {
00769                     if( (++vg->ix) >= vg->nx ) return -1;
00770                     micro->vg->ix = 0;
00771                 }
00772                 else if( micro->vg->iy < 0 ) {
00773                     if( (--vg->iy) < 0 ) return -1;
00774                     micro->vg->iy = micro->vg->ny-1;
00775                 }
00776                 else if( micro->vg->iy >= micro->vg->ny ) {
00777                     if( (++vg->iy) >= vg->ny ) return -1;
00778                     micro->vg->iy = 0;
00779                 }
00780                 else if( micro->vg->iz < 0 ) {
00781                     if( (--vg->iz) < 0 ) return -1;
00782                     micro->vg->iz = micro->vg->nz-1;
00783                 }
00784                 else if( micro->vg->iz >= micro->vg->nz ) {
00785                     if( (++vg->iz) >= vg->nz ) return -1;
00786                     micro->vg->iz = 0;
00787                 }
00788                 inew = micro->vg->ix + micro->vg->iy*micro->vg->nx +
00789                        micro->vg->iz*micro->vg->nxy;
00790             }
00791             voxel = vg->ix + vg->iy*vg->nx + vg->iz*vg->nxy;
00792             if( newmed ) *newmed = micro->medium(voxel,inew);
00793             return voxel*nr + inew;
00794         }
00795         int voxel = vg->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,normal);
00796         if( voxel < 0 ) return voxel;
00797         EGS_Vector x1(x + u*t);
00798         x1 -= EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz);
00799         int ilocal = micro->vg->isWhereFast(x1);
00800         if( ilocal < 0 ) egsFatal("x=(%g,%g,%g) x+u*t=(%g,%g,%g) x1=(%g,%g,%g)\n",x.x,x.y,x.z,(x+u*t).x,(x+u*t).y,(x+u*t).z,x1.x,x1.y,x1.z);
00801         if( newmed ) *newmed = micro->medium(voxel,ilocal);
00802         return voxel*nr + ilocal;
00803     };
00804 
00805     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00806             const EGS_Vector &u) { return vg->howfarToOutside(ireg,x,u); };
00807 
00808     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00809         if( ireg < 0 ) return vg->hownear(ireg,x);
00810         int voxel = ireg/nr; int ilocal = ireg - voxel*nr;
00811         vg->setIndeces(voxel);
00812         EGS_Vector x1(x-EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz));
00813         return micro->vg->hownear(ilocal,x1);
00814     };
00815 
00816     int medium(int ireg) const {
00817         int voxel = ireg/nr; int ilocal = ireg - voxel*nr;
00818         return micro->medium(voxel,ilocal);
00819     };
00820 
00821     int getMaxStep() const {
00822         return micro->mx*micro->nx + micro->my*micro->ny +
00823                micro->mz*micro->nz + 1;
00824     };
00825 
00826     const string &getType() const { return type; };
00827 
00828 protected:
00829 
00830     EGS_VoxelGeometry      *vg;
00831     EGS_MicroMatrixCluster *micro;
00832     int                    nr;  
00833 
00834     void setMedia(EGS_Input *inp, int nmed, const int *med_ind);
00835 
00836     static string type;
00837 };
00838 
00934 class EGS_VHP_EXPORT EGS_VHPGeometry : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00935 
00936 public:
00937 
00938       EGS_VHPGeometry(const char *phantom_file, const char *media_file,
00939               int slice_min=0, int slice_max=1000000, const string &Name="");
00940 
00941       ~EGS_VHPGeometry();
00942 
00943       bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00944           return vg->isInside(x);
00945       };
00946 
00947       int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00948           int ireg = vg->isWhere(x);
00949           if( !nmicro ) return ireg;
00950           int iorg = organs->getOrgan(vg->iz,vg->iy,vg->ix);
00951           int mict = organ_micro[iorg];
00952           if( mict < 0 ) return ireg; // i.e., no micros in this macro voxel
00953           EGS_Vector x1(x - EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz));
00954           int micr = micros[mict]->isWhere(vg->ix,vg->iy,vg->iz,x1);
00955           return nmax*mict + micr + nmacro;
00956       };
00957 
00958       int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) { return isWhere(x); };
00959 
00960       int medium(int ireg) const {
00961           if( ireg < nmacro )
00962               return organ_media[organs->getOrgan(ireg)];
00963           ireg -= nmacro; int mict = ireg/nmax;
00964           int iloc = ireg - mict*nmax;
00965           return micros[mict]->medium(iloc);
00966       };
00967 
00968       int computeIntersections(int ireg, int n, const EGS_Vector &X,
00969               const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_GeometryIntersections *isections) {
00970           // fix the following
00971           if( nmicro > 0 ) return EGS_BaseGeometry::computeIntersections(ireg,
00972                                      n,X,u,isections);
00973           if( n < 1 ) return -1;
00974           int result = vg->computeIntersections(ireg,n,X,u,isections);
00975           if( !result ) return result; // no intersections
00976           int nloop = result > 0 ? result : n;
00977           int first = isections[0].ireg >= 0 ? 0 : 1;
00978           EGS_VoxelInfo *v = vg->v;
00979           for(int j=first; j<nloop; ++j) isections[j].imed =
00980               organ_media[organs->getOrgan(v[j].iz,v[j].iy,v[j].ix)];
00981           return result;
00982       };
00983 
00984       EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00985                       const EGS_Vector &u) {
00986           return vg->howfarToOutside(ireg,x,u);
00987       };
00988 
00989       int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00990                  EGS_Float &t, int *newmed=0, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00991           if( nmicro < 1 ) { // no micro matrices
00992               int inew = vg->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,normal);
00993               if( newmed && inew >= 0 && inew != ireg )
00994                   *newmed = organ_media[organs->getOrgan(vg->iz,vg->iy,vg->ix)];
00995               return inew;
00996           }
00997           if( ireg >= 0 && ireg < nmacro ) {
00998               // in macro matrix
00999               int inew = vg->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,normal);
01000               if( t < 0 ) {
01001                   if( t < -1e-5 ) {
01002                       egsWarning("negative step %g in macro voxel\n",t);
01003                       egsWarning("x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",x.x,x.y,x.z,
01004                               u.x,u.y,u.z);
01005                       egsWarning("ix=%d iy=%d iz=%d\n",vg->ix,vg->iy,vg->iz);
01006                       egsFatal("quitting\n");
01007                   }
01008                   t = 1e-15;
01009               }
01010               if( inew < 0 || inew == ireg ) return inew;
01011                 // i.e., exits macro geometry or stays in same macro voxel
01012               int iorg = organs->getOrgan(vg->iz,vg->iy,vg->ix);
01013               int mict = organ_micro[iorg];
01014               if( mict < 0 ) { // no micro matrix in the new macro voxel
01015                   if( newmed ) *newmed = organ_media[iorg]; return inew;
01016               }
01017               // if here, enters micro matrix.
01018               EGS_Vector x1(x + u*t -
01019                       EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz));
01020               int micr = micros[mict]->isWhere(vg->ix,vg->iy,vg->iz,x1,newmed);
01021               return nmax*mict + micr + nmacro;
01022           }
01023           if( ireg >= 0 ) {
01024               // in a micro matrix.
01025               int ireg1 = ireg - nmacro; int mict = ireg1/nmax;
01026               int iloc = ireg1 - mict*nmax;
01027               //return micros[mict]->medium(iloc);
01028               int imic, ix, iy, iz;
01029               EGS_MicroMatrixCluster *micro = micros[mict];
01030               micro->getIndeces(iloc,imic,ix,iy,iz);
01031               int ilocal = iloc - imic*micros[mict]->nreg;
01032               // now we have to figure out the macro voxel indeces
01033               // in principle one could simply use vg->isWhere(x), but
01034               // this is bound to get us in trouble with roundoff errors.
01035               // we therefore treat the special case where x is in an edge
01036               // voxel of the micro matrix in a special way
01037               int lax, lay, laz;
01038               EGS_Float aux = x.x*vg->dxi;
01039               if( ix > 0 && ix < micros[mict]->vg->nx-1 ) lax = (int) aux;
01040               else if( ix == 0 ) lax = (int) (aux+0.5);
01041               else               lax = (int) (aux-0.5);
01042               aux = x.y*vg->dyi;
01043               if( iy > 0 && iy < micros[mict]->vg->ny-1 ) lay = (int) aux;
01044               else if( iy == 0 ) lay = (int) (aux+0.5);
01045               else               lay = (int) (aux-0.5);
01046               aux = x.z*vg->dzi;
01047               if( iz > 0 && iz < micros[mict]->vg->nz-1 ) laz = (int) aux;
01048               else if( iz == 0 ) laz = (int) (aux+0.5);
01049               else               laz = (int) (aux-0.5);
01050               EGS_Vector x1(x - EGS_Vector(vg->dx*lax,vg->dy*lay,vg->dz*laz));
01051               int inew = micro->vg->howfarIn(ilocal,ix,iy,iz,x1,u,t,normal);
01052               if( t < 0 ) {
01053                   if( t < -1e-5 ) {
01054                       egsWarning("negative step %g in micro matrix\n",t);
01055                       egsWarning("x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",x.x,x.y,x.z,
01056                               u.x,u.y,u.z);
01057                       egsWarning("ix=%d iy=%d iz=%d\n",ix,iy,iz);
01058                       egsWarning("lax=%d lay=%d laz=%d\n",lax,lay,laz);
01059                       egsWarning("x1=(%g,%g,%g)\n",x1.x,x1.y,x1.z);
01060                       egsFatal("quitting\n");
01061                   }
01062                   t = 0;
01063               }
01064               if( inew == ilocal ) return ireg;
01065               if( inew < 0 ) {
01066                   // exiting current micro matrix => entering new
01067                   // macro voxel.
01068                   // 1. find which one and set new micro region
01069                   if( micro->vg->ix < 0 ) {
01070                       if( (--lax) < 0 ) return -1;
01071                       micro->vg->ix = micro->vg->nx-1;
01072                   }
01073                   else if( micro->vg->ix >= micro->vg->nx ) {
01074                       if( (++lax) >= vg->nx ) return -1;
01075                       micro->vg->ix = 0;
01076                   }
01077                   else if( micro->vg->iy < 0 ) {
01078                       if( (--lay) < 0 ) return -1;
01079                       micro->vg->iy = micro->vg->ny-1;
01080                   }
01081                   else if( micro->vg->iy >= micro->vg->ny ) {
01082                       if( (++lay) >= vg->ny ) return -1;
01083                       micro->vg->iy = 0;
01084                   }
01085                   else if( micro->vg->iz < 0 ) {
01086                       if( (--laz) < 0 ) return -1;
01087                       micro->vg->iz = micro->vg->nz-1;
01088                   }
01089                   else if( micro->vg->iz >= micro->vg->nz ) {
01090                       if( (++laz) >= vg->nz ) return -1;
01091                       micro->vg->iz = 0;
01092                   }
01093                   // 2. micro matrix in new macro voxel?
01094                   int iorg = organs->getOrgan(laz,lay,lax);
01095                   mict = organ_micro[iorg];
01096                   if( mict < 0 ) { // no.
01097                       if( newmed ) *newmed = organ_media[iorg];
01098                       return lax + lay*vg->nx + laz*vg->nxy;
01099                   }
01100                   inew = micro->vg->ix + micro->vg->iy*micro->vg->nx +
01101                       micro->vg->iz*micro->vg->nxy;
01102                   int lix = lax%micros[mict]->mx;
01103                   int liy = lay%micros[mict]->my;
01104                   int liz = laz%micros[mict]->mz;
01105                   imic = lix + micros[mict]->mx*liy + micros[mict]->mxy*liz;
01106               }
01107               if( newmed ) *newmed = micros[mict]->medium(imic,inew);
01108               return nmax*mict + inew + nmacro;
01109           }
01110           // outside
01111           int imac = vg->howfarOut(x,u,t,normal);
01112           if( imac < 0 ) return imac;
01113           int iorg = organs->getOrgan(vg->iz,vg->iy,vg->ix);
01114           int mict = organ_micro[iorg];
01115           if( mict < 0 ) {
01116               if( newmed ) *newmed = organ_media[iorg];
01117               return imac;
01118           }
01119           EGS_Vector x1(x + u*t);
01120           x1 -= EGS_Vector(vg->dx*vg->ix,vg->dy*vg->iy,vg->dz*vg->iz);
01121           int ilocal = micros[mict]->vg->isWhereFast(x1);
01122           int ix=vg->ix%micros[mict]->mx,
01123               iy=vg->iy%micros[mict]->my,
01124               iz=vg->iz%micros[mict]->mz;
01125           int imic = ix + iy*micros[mict]->mx + iz*micros[mict]->mxy;
01126           if( newmed ) *newmed = micros[mict]->medium(imic,ilocal);
01127           return nmax*mict + imic*micros[mict]->nreg + ilocal + nmacro;
01128       };
01129 
01130       EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
01131           if( ireg < nmacro ) return vg->hownear(ireg,x);
01132           ireg -= nmacro; int mict = ireg/nmax;
01133           int iloc = ireg - mict*nmax;
01134           int imic, ix, iy, iz;
01135           EGS_MicroMatrixCluster *micro = micros[mict];
01136           micro->getIndeces(iloc,imic,ix,iy,iz);
01137           int ilocal = iloc - imic*micro->nreg;
01138           // now we have to figure out the macro voxel indeces
01139           // in principle one could simply use vg->isWhere(x), but
01140           // this is bound to get us in trouble with roundoff errors.
01141           // we therefore treat the special case where x is in an edge
01142           // voxel of the micro matrix in a special way
01143           int lax, lay, laz;
01144           EGS_Float aux = x.x*vg->dxi;
01145           if( ix > 0 && ix < micro->vg->nx-1 ) lax = (int) aux;
01146           else if( ix == 0 ) lax = (int) (aux+0.5);
01147           else               lax = (int) (aux-0.5);
01148           aux = x.y*vg->dyi;
01149           if( iy > 0 && iy < micro->vg->ny-1 ) lay = (int) aux;
01150           else if( iy == 0 ) lay = (int) (aux+0.5);
01151           else               lay = (int) (aux-0.5);
01152           aux = x.z*vg->dzi;
01153           if( iz > 0 && iz < micro->vg->nz-1 ) laz = (int) aux;
01154           else if( iz == 0 ) laz = (int) (aux+0.5);
01155           else               laz = (int) (aux-0.5);
01156           EGS_Vector x1(x - EGS_Vector(vg->dx*lax,vg->dy*lay,vg->dz*laz));
01157           return micro->vg->hownearIn(ix,iy,iz,x1);
01158       };
01159 
01160       int getMaxStep() const {
01161           if( !nmicro ) return vg->nx+vg->ny+vg->nz+1;
01162           int nmx=0, nmy=0, nmz=0;
01163           for(int mict=0; mict<nmicro; ++mict) {
01164               if( micros[mict]->nx > nmx ) nmx = micros[mict]->nx;
01165               if( micros[mict]->ny > nmy ) nmy = micros[mict]->ny;
01166               if( micros[mict]->nx > nmz ) nmx = micros[mict]->nz;
01167           }
01168           return vg->nx*nmx+vg->ny*nmy+vg->nz*nmz+1;
01169       };
01170 
01171       bool isOK() const { return (vg && organs); };
01172 
01173       int getNx() const { return vg->nx; };
01174       int getNy() const { return vg->ny; };
01175       int getNz() const { return vg->nz; };
01176 
01177       const string &getType() const { return type; };
01178 
01179       void printInfo() const;
01180 
01181       //static EGS_VHPGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *);
01182       void setMicros(EGS_Input *);
01183 
01184 protected:
01185 
01186       EGS_VoxelGeometry *vg;
01187       VHP_OrganData     *organs;
01188 
01189       int     organ_media[256];
01190       int     organ_micro[256];
01191       string  organ_names[256];
01192       EGS_MicroMatrixCluster **micros;
01193       int                    nmicro;
01194       int                    nmax, nmacro;
01195 
01196       static string    type;
01197 
01198       void setup();
01199 
01200       void setMedia(EGS_Input *inp, int nmed, const int *med_ind);
01201 
01202 };
